# Colliatur Spells
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Colliatur|colliatur]] spells introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Alien Surge]]
- [[Crystal Expulsion]]
- [[Crystal Nova]]
- [[Greater Alien Surge]]
- [[Light of Knowledge]]
